title: User belongs to multiple groups
custom_preconds:
1. For the users who belong to both Group1 and Group2, all the exceptions from SC2 must be applied
2. For any other users, all the exceptions from default steering config must be applied
custom_steps:
1. Create an SC say SC1 for a group say Group1 and add all types of exceptions
2. Create an SC say SC2 for a group say Group2 and add all types of exceptions
3. Make sure to have higher priority for SC2
4. Access all types of exceptions from the client for a user from Group1
5. Access all types of exceptions from the client for a user from Group2
custom_expected:
1. For the users who belong to both Group1 and Group2, all the exceptions from SC2 must be applied
2. For any other users, all the exceptions from default steering config must be applied
